cmdPreset.name: Focus
cmdPreset.desc: Which aspect of the client to focus on

loadingvids.name: Boot Sequence
loadingvids.desc: Choose the animation shown when the app starts.

domoptimizer.name: DOM Optimizer
domoptimizer.desc: Optimizes DOM operations to improve rendering performance.

gpuhint.name: GPU Hinting
gpuhint.desc: Provides hints to the browser about how to optimize rendering for GPU acceleration.

lazyimageloading.name: Lazy Image Loading
lazyimageloading.desc: Loads images only when they are visible in the viewport.

scrollintoview.name: Optimized Scroll Into View
scrollintoview.desc: Optimizes the scrollIntoView behavior for smoother scrolling in chat windows.
